mapper.insert: insert into shopping_user(id, username, email, phone_number, password) values(shopping_user_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{password})
mapper.update: update shopping_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into receiving_address(id, user_id, consignee, where_city, street_address, postal_code, phone_number) values(receiving_address_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{consignee}, #{whereCity}, #{streetAddress}, #{postalCode}, #{phoneNumber})
